com.increff.commons.lang

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.increff.commons.lang.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends Object
    Allows creation/deletion of temporary files and directories

        public static File getTempDir(String dirName)
                       throws IOException
        Create a temporary directory with the specified name in JAVA_TEMP_DIR location (if not exists)
        Parameters:
        dirName - Name of directory to be created
        Returns:
        File object representing created temporary directory
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTempFile

        public static File createTempFile(File dir,
                                  String fileName)
                           throws IOException
        Create a temporary, in-memory file with given filename in specified directory
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory where file is to be created
        fileName - Name of file
        Returns:
        File object representing created file
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTempFileWithExt

        public static File createTempFileWithExt(File dir,
                                         String ext)
                                  throws IOException
        Create a temporary, in-memory file using just the extension (assigns random name) in specified directory
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory where file is to be created
        ext - Extension of the file to be created e.g ".csv", ".txt"
        Returns:
        File object representing the created file
        Throws:
        IOException
